          <h2>Background:</h2>
          <p>Dean was introduced to the startup world through co-founding a YC company with some friends of mine from college one year before graduating. After earning his degree from Olin College, Dean spent two years at a defense contractor working on intelligent networked munitions, followed by a three-year stint as a full-time program director and instructor (and IT person, sales person, social media person) at a local Karate school. He is very excited to be returning to the fast-paced startup world!</div>
